content: continue working in stockinette round 12 rs use the technique for the folded collar to create a folded hem repeat for the left hem start picking up sts at the top left front edge right pocket hem left pocket hem starting at the top of the right pocket/bottom of the left pocket pick up approx 50 sts pick up 5 skip 1 along the edge round 1 ws p round 2 rs k until 4 sts left k2tog then k2 round 2 rs k2 then k2togtbl k till end of row round 3 ws p2 then p2tog p till end of row round 3 ws p till 4 sts left p2togtbl then p2 repeat round 2 and 3 round 7 ws p2 then m1l p till end of row round 7 ws p till 2 sts left m1r then p2 round 8 rs k until 2 sts left m1l then k2 round 8 rs k2 then m1r k till end of row repeat round 7 and 8 round 12 rs use the technique for the folded collar to create a folded hem sew the left and right edge of the hem to the body using a thread of similar color - 14 - z i p p e r for this section use 3mm needles and the thicker yarn - 15 - z i p p e r facing transfer the 8 sts that were put on hold back onto your needles join the yarn so that you can start knitting on the ws the side that faces your already knitted body part is the ws round 1 ws p7 slip the last st purlwise with the yarn in the front to create a clean edge round 2 rs k7 slip the last st knitwise with the yarn in the back repeat round 1 and 2 round 170 178 186 rs bobble repeat for the other side zipper8 if your zipper is too long trim it at the top to match the length of the garment sew in the zipper after blocking first secure the zipper to the jacket and the facing with pins begin sewing at the top start by attaching the zipper to the inside of the folded collar between the 2 layers of the collar using thread in a similar color to create an almost invisible seam on the rs sew along the edge where you picked up sts for the vertical folded hem do not stretch the knitted fabric while sewing after the collar sew body + zipper + facing together at the bottom attach the horizontal edge of the facing to the bottom edge of the body make sure the zipper and facing are not visible from the rs to attach the outer vertical edge of the facing to the ws of the body work from the bottom up and make sure that the seam is not visible from the rs - 16 - a p p e n d i x adjust the number
